HEADER.TITLE: Logframe Generator

LOGICAL_FRAMEWORK.TITLE: Logical Framework
LOGICAL_FRAMEWORK.DESCRIPTION_HELPER: What will be achieved at this level?
LOGICAL_FRAMEWORK.INDICATORS_HELPER: SMART indicators (Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound)
LOGICAL_FRAMEWORK.ASSUMPTIONS_HELPER: External factors that may impact results
LOGICAL_FRAMEWORK.EMPTY_STATE: No levels added yet. Click the buttons above to add Goal, Outcome, Output, or Activity levels.

EXPORT.TITLE: Export Your Logframe
EXPORT.DESCRIPTION: Download your logical framework in various formats
EXPORT.ERROR_NO_CONTENT: Please add some content to your logframe before exporting.
EXPORT.ERROR_NO_CONTENT_IMAGE: Please add some content to your logframe before exporting as matrix.
EXPORT.ERROR_MATRIX_NOT_FOUND: Matrix element not found. Please ensure the logframe has content.

EXPORT.CONFIRM_REMOVE_LEVEL: Are you sure you want to remove this level? This action cannot be undone.

BEST_PRACTICES.TITLE: Logframe Best Practices
BEST_PRACTICES.DESCRIPTION: Follow these guidelines to create effective and professional logical frameworks

STRUCTURE.TITLE: Structure & Hierarchy
ITEMS: Start with a clear Goal (Impact level)
Define 2-4 Outcomes that contribute to the Goal
List key Activities needed for each Output
Ensure logical flow: Activities → Outputs → Outcomes → Goal

ASSUMPTIONS.TITLE: Assumptions & Risks
ITEMS: Identify external factors beyond project control
Focus on conditions necessary for success
Consider political, economic, and social factors

QUALITY.TITLE: Quality Checks
ITEMS: Ensure indicators are not activities in disguise
Verify all levels have appropriate indicators

MISTAKES.TITLE: Common Mistakes to Avoid
ITEMS: Avoid too many objectives per level
Don't use vague or unmeasurable language
Avoid indicators that measure inputs instead of results
